import React, {Component} from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {connect} from 'react-redux' import {Dropdown, DropdownItem, DropdownToggle, DropdownMenu} from 'reactstrap' import {IoMdCart} from 'react-icons/io' import '../styles/Header.css' import {onLogoutUser} from '../1.actions/index' import Axios from 'axios' const URL_API = 'http://localhost:8888/' class Header extends Component { state = { dropdownOpen: false, quantityCart: 0 } toggle = () => { // if(this.state.dropdownOpen === false) { // this.setState({dropdownOpen: true}) // } else { // this.setState({dropdownOpen: false}) // } this.setState({dropdownOpen: !this.state.dropdownOpen}) } componentDidMount() { this.getTotalCart() } getTotalCart = () => { Axios.get( URL_API + 'carts/getcart', { params: { userId: this.props.userId } } ).then((res) => { this.setState({quantityCart: res.data.length}) // console.log(this.state.quantityCart) }).catch((err) => { console.log(err) }) } render() { // BELUM LOGIN if(!this.props.userEmail) { return (
Register
Login
Logo
Brand 1
Brand 2
All Products
) } else if(this.props.role === 'user') { return (
{/*
Account Info Address Change Password
*/} Hello {this.props.firstName} Account Info Address Change Password
{this.state.quantityCart}
Logo
Brand 1
Brand 2
All Products
) } else { // HEADER FOR ADMIN return (
{/*
Account Info Address Change Password
*/} Admin Dashboard Manage Product Transaction
Logo
Brand 1
Brand 2
All Products
) } } } const mapStateToProps = (state) => { return { userEmail: state.auth.email, userId: state.auth.id, role: state.auth.role, firstName: state.auth.firstName } } export default connect(mapStateToProps, {onLogoutUser})(Header)
